Articles.Content:
For this challenge you must send a kerbinaut outside kerbin\'s SOI and eva him, then you must land on the moon/minmus/launch annother ship to go and recover him, the winner of this challenge is the person who can do it in the fastest time(if anyone manages to do it).

RULES:

The kerbinaut must be outside the planets SOI before you go and land/relaunch

Recovery time starts as soon as you eva the kerbinaut

No mods allowed (apart from mech jeb)

Pictures or it didnt happen

15% off your recovery time if you can get him back to kerbin

45% off your recovery time if you only use 1 ship to complete this mission

(will change rules if required)

Good luck!

TIMES:

1.

2.

3.

4.

5.

Less difficult challenge:

leave the kerbinaut in orbit, land, and pick him up on the way back to kerbin.

MINMUS TIMES:

RULES:

Recovery time starts as soon as you eva the kerbinaut

No mods allowed (apart from mech jeb)
